item.title: Sed
item.description: This is an ongoing work in progress, please let me know if you have any suggestions/feedback. Basic syntax sed [ options ] script filename Where script is either a single sed command or file of sed commands (must use with -f option). Sed commands look like this: action/pattern/replacement/flag Filename can be omitted if you’re piping in standard input. Actions p: print s: substitute s accepts the following flags which are appended to the end of the command (e.
